changeSet.author: settler
changeSet.sql:
INSERT INTO dev_settler.public.prv_object VALUES (NEXTVAL('dev_settler.public.mod_category_id_seq')); INSERT INTO dev_settler.public.mod_transaction ( "id", "reference", "type", "creator", "value", "created" ) VALUES ( (SELECT MAX(id) FROM dev_settler.public.prv_object), 'TRA151112121212', 'NOR', (SELECT id FROM dev_settler.public.prv_user WHERE login = 'admin'), 12.50, '2015-11-12 12:12:12' );
INSERT INTO dev_settler.public.prv_object VALUES (NEXTVAL('dev_settler.public.mod_category_id_seq')); INSERT INTO dev_settler.public.mod_transaction ( "id", "reference", "type", "creator", "value", "created" ) VALUES ( (SELECT MAX(id) FROM dev_settler.public.prv_object), 'TRA151113150000', 'OTH', (SELECT id FROM dev_settler.public.prv_user WHERE login = 'user'), 10.50, '2015-11-13 15:00:00' );

INSERT INTO dev_settler.public.mod_redistribution ( "type", "parent", "user", "value" ) VALUES ( 'O', (SELECT id FROM dev_settler.public.mod_transaction WHERE reference = 'TRA151112121212'), (SELECT id FROM dev_settler.public.prv_user WHERE login = 'admin'), 12.5 ); INSERT INTO dev_settler.public.mod_redistribution ( "type", "parent", "user", "value" ) VALUES ( 'C', (SELECT id FROM dev_settler.public.mod_transaction WHERE reference = 'TRA151112121212'), (SELECT id FROM dev_settler.public.prv_user WHERE login = 'adam.trocki'), 2.5 ); INSERT INTO dev_settler.public.mod_redistribution ( "type", "parent", "user", "value" ) VALUES ( 'C', (SELECT id FROM dev_settler.public.mod_transaction WHERE reference = 'TRA151112121212'), (SELECT id FROM dev_settler.public.prv_user WHERE login = 'jan.nowak'), 10 );
INSERT INTO dev_settler.public.mod_redistribution ( "type", "parent", "user", "value" ) VALUES ( 'O', (SELECT id FROM dev_settler.public.mod_transaction WHERE reference = 'TRA151113150000'), (SELECT id FROM dev_settler.public.prv_user WHERE login = 'user'), 5 ); INSERT INTO dev_settler.public.mod_redistribution ( "type", "parent", "user", "value" ) VALUES ( 'O', (SELECT id FROM dev_settler.public.mod_transaction WHERE reference = 'TRA151113150000'), (SELECT id FROM dev_settler.public.prv_user WHERE login = 'admin'), 5.5 ); INSERT INTO dev_settler.public.mod_redistribution ( "type", "parent", "user", "value" ) VALUES ( 'C', (SELECT id FROM dev_settler.public.mod_transaction WHERE reference = 'TRA151113150000'), (SELECT id FROM dev_settler.public.prv_user WHERE login = 'adam.trocki'), 3 ); INSERT INTO dev_settler.public.mod_redistribution ( "type", "parent", "user", "value" ) VALUES ( 'C', (SELECT id FROM dev_settler.public.mod_transaction WHERE reference = 'TRA151113150000'), (SELECT id FROM dev_settler.public.prv_user WHERE login = 'jan.nowak'), 3 ); INSERT INTO dev_settler.public.mod_redistribution ( "type", "parent", "user", "value" ) VALUES ( 'C', (SELECT id FROM dev_settler.public.mod_transaction WHERE reference = 'TRA151113150000'), (SELECT id FROM dev_settler.public.prv_user WHERE login = 'jan.kos'), 4.5 );

INSERT INTO dev_settler.public.prv_object VALUES (NEXTVAL('dev_settler.public.mod_category_id_seq')); INSERT INTO dev_settler.public.mod_comment ( "id", "prv_object", "prv_user", "parent", "created", "value" ) VALUES ( (SELECT MAX(id) FROM dev_settler.public.prv_object), (SELECT id FROM dev_settler.public.mod_transaction WHERE reference = 'TRA151112121212'), (SELECT id FROM dev_settler.public.prv_user WHERE login = 'user'), NULL, '2015-12-21 14:14:40', 'Comment by user to TRA151112121212' );

INSERT INTO dev_settler.mod_redistribution ( type, parent, user, value ) VALUES ( 'O', (SELECT id FROM dev_settler.mod_transaction WHERE reference = 'TRA151112121212'), (SELECT id FROM dev_settler.prv_user WHERE login = 'admin'), 12.5 ); INSERT INTO dev_settler.mod_redistribution ( type, parent, user, value ) VALUES ( 'C', (SELECT id FROM dev_settler.mod_transaction WHERE reference = 'TRA151112121212'), (SELECT id FROM dev_settler.prv_user WHERE login = 'adam.trocki'), 2.5 ); INSERT INTO dev_settler.mod_redistribution ( type, parent, user, value ) VALUES ( 'C', (SELECT id FROM dev_settler.mod_transaction WHERE reference = 'TRA151112121212'), (SELECT id FROM dev_settler.prv_user WHERE login = 'jan.nowak'), 10 );

INSERT INTO dev_settler.prv_object VALUES (); INSERT INTO dev_settler.mod_comment ( id, prv_object, prv_user, parent, created, value ) VALUES ( LAST_INSERT_ID(), (SELECT id FROM dev_settler.mod_transaction WHERE reference = 'TRA151112121212'), (SELECT id FROM dev_settler.prv_user WHERE login = 'user'), NULL, '2015-12-21 14:14:40', 'Comment by user to TRA151112121212' );
